sense.gloss: emphasizing, calling attention to, making a display of, showing off, playing up, touting, using as a selling point, pitch

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑扇動↑↓せんどう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の|アピール|に↑動↑↓うご↓かされた。
sdata.e: The students were animated by the agitator's appeal.

sdata.j: ↑内面↑↓ないめん↓を↑理解↑↓りかい↓して↑貰↑↓もら↓うための|アピール|も↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓なのさ！ボクのアグレッシブな↑行動↑↓こうどう↓もその↑中↑↓なか↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つ！
sdata.e: I also need to get people to understand the real me! My forceful behaviour is one way I try to do this!
